remixlab.dandelion.geom

Interface Rotation

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Copyable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Quat, Rot

    public interface Rotation
extends Copyable
    Interface for 2D Rot and 3D Quat rotations.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float angle() 
      void compose(Rotation o)
      Compose the rotation
      void fromMatrix(Mat glMatrix)
      Sets the rotation from the given Mat representation.
      void fromRotatedBasis(Vec X, Vec Y, Vec Z)
      Sets the rotation from the three rotated vectors of an orthogonal basis.
      void fromTo(Vec from, Vec to)
      Define orientation from the two vectors.
      Rotation get()
      Returns a deep copy of the object.
      Rotation inverse()
      Returns the inverse rotation
      Mat inverseMatrix()
      Returns the associated inverse rotation Mat.
      Vec inverseRotate(Vec v)
      Returns the image of v by the inverse() rotation.
      Mat matrix()
      Returns the Mat which represents the rotation matrix associated with the Quat.
      void negate()
      Negates all object components
      float normalize()
      Normalizes the rotation
      void print()
      Prints orientation data.
      Vec rotate(Vec v)
      Returns the image of v by the rotation.

        Rotation get()

      • matrix

        Mat matrix()
        Returns the Mat which represents the rotation matrix associated with the Quat.

      • inverseMatrix

        Mat inverseMatrix()
        Returns the associated inverse rotation Mat. This is simply matrix() of the inverse().

      • fromMatrix

        void fromMatrix(Mat glMatrix)
        Sets the rotation from the given Mat representation.

      • fromRotatedBasis

        void fromRotatedBasis(Vec X,
                    Vec Y,
                    Vec Z)
        Sets the rotation from the three rotated vectors of an orthogonal basis.

        The three vectors do not have to be normalized but must be orthogonal and direct (i,e., X^Y=k*Z, with k>0).

      • normalize

        float normalize()
        Normalizes the rotation

      • fromTo

        void fromTo(Vec from,
          Vec to)
        Define orientation from the two vectors.

      • print

        void print()
        Prints orientation data.
